testsuite.system-out: Scenario: Ensure Audio works when previewing a Slidehow Question with mp3 ?[90m# question/slideshow/TestAudioPlayback.feature:20?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI enter valid information for the question name as "?[0m?[32m?[1mNew Question 2?[0m?[32m"?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.enterQuestionName(String)?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI click the Slideshow Audio File Manager button?[0m ?[90m# AddSlideshowSteps.clickAudioFileManagerButton()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI click the audio file named "?[0m?[32m?[1mAudio_Test.mp3?[0m?[32m"?[0m ?[90m# AddSlideshowSteps.clickOnAudioFile(String)?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI click to Preview the Slideshow?[0m ?[90m# AddSlideshowSteps.clickPreviewButton()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI am previewing the Slideshow?[0m ?[90m# AddSlideshowSteps.assertSlideshowPreviewPage()?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI begin playback of the Slideshow?[0m ?[90m# AddSlideshowSteps.beginPlayback()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI pause playback of the Slideshow?[0m ?[90m# AddSlideshowSteps.pauseSlideshow()?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mcurrent playback time is greater than 0?[0m ?[90m# AddSlideshowSteps.assertSlideshowPlayed()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI close the question preview window?[0m ?[90m# QuestionPreviewSteps.closeQuestionPreviewWindow()?[0m
